<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heaven's Thunder](/Feats.aspx?ID=2199) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 224, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198)

</column>

---

Until the end of your next turn, your [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks and any [monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112) weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

 If you also know the [_ki blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=484) ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (_ki blast_ loses the [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) trait and gains the [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147) trait instead).
name: Heaven's Thunder
